Back To Recipes

Clean counter space:

Empty dishwasher
Load dishwasher
Put away anything not related to recipe away

Get out the following ingredients:

2 Leeks and wash
5 Crimini Mushrooms and wash
2 Garlic Cloves
Soy Sauce
Siracha Sauce
Pepper Flake
Hoison Sauce
3 Vegetable Oils

Recipe

Put 3 Seconds Vegetable Oils in pantelligent on 4 / stove top on 6
Cut in half 2 Leeks
Cut leek in strips and soak in glass bowl of water
Chop 2 Garlic Cloves
Cut 5 Crimini Mushrooms
Wait 5 minutes put vegetables in pan
Put in Measuring tsp Soy Sauce
Put in Measuring tbsp Siracha Sauce
Put in Measuring tbsp Pepper Flake
Put in Measuring tsp Hoison Sauce
Wait 2 minutes
